emerging_technologies.name: AI-Driven Personal Health Assistants
emerging_technologies.description: AI systems that monitor health metrics, predict health issues, and suggest personalized lifestyle changes.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Could significantly reduce healthcare costs, improve quality of life, but raises privacy concerns.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Widespread adoption depends on regulatory approval for health data usage and public trust in AI.

emerging_technologies.name: Quantum-Resistant Encryption
emerging_technologies.description: Encryption methods designed to withstand attacks from quantum computers.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Ensures data security in the quantum computing era, critical for government and financial sectors.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Adoption will be driven by the need for long-term data security and potential regulatory mandates.

emerging_technologies.name: Autonomous Urban Transport Networks
emerging_technologies.description: A network of self-driving vehicles integrated with urban infrastructure for optimized transport.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Reduces congestion, pollution, and accident rates, but requires significant urban planning changes.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Requires legislative support, public acceptance, and substantial investment in infrastructure.

emerging_technologies.name: Neural Lace Interface
emerging_technologies.description: A mesh-like interface for brain-computer interactions, allowing thought-based control of devices.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Potential for enhancing human capabilities but poses ethical questions about identity and privacy.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Adoption will be slow due to ethical, health, and safety concerns.

mainstream_technologies.name: Blockchain for Supply Chain
mainstream_technologies.description: Utilization of blockchain for transparent, secure, and efficient supply chain management.
mainstream_technologies.adoption_status: Becoming standard in industries requiring traceability and accountability, like pharmaceuticals and food.

mainstream_technologies.name: Smart Grid Enhancements
mainstream_technologies.description: Advanced smart grid systems with AI for energy optimization, resilience, and integration of renewable energy.
mainstream_technologies.adoption_status: Increasingly adopted by utility companies to meet sustainability goals and manage energy distribution.

epoch_themes.description: Moving towards systems where control and data are spread across networks for security and efficiency.
epoch_themes.societal_impact: Enhances security and privacy but could disrupt existing centralized systems.
epoch_themes.global_trends: Driven by the need for resilience against cyber threats and the rise of digital currencies.

epoch_themes.description: Technologies that enhance human capabilities, focusing on cognitive and physical enhancements.
epoch_themes.societal_impact: Could redefine human potential but raises ethical dilemmas about fairness and access.
epoch_themes.global_trends: Growing interest in transhumanism, driven by advances in biotechnology and AI.
